2015 Men's Lacrosse Roster

Tom Sanczyk

13 Steve Brodeur

Position G

Height 5-11

Weight 196

Class Junior

Hometown Wallingford, Pa.

High School Strath Haven High School

Major Economics

Bio

Related

Stats

Historical

Biography

WHY LEHIGH? “I chose Lehigh for the campus, top academics and athletics, along with the lacrosse coaching staff.”

AS A JUNIOR (2015): Did not see action.

AS A SOPHOMORE (2014): Saw action in nine games, starting one, while posting a strong 6.80 GAA and 58.1 save percentage with a 1-0 record … Played in the final 2:38 of the Patriot League Championship Game at #1 Loyola (4/27) … Stopped three-of-four shots in just over 10 minutes of action at Lafayette (4/18) … Made four saves, allowing two goals, in the fourth quarter against Holy Cross (3/29) … Finished with six saves in first-career start vs. Monmouth (3/26) … Stopped the only shot sent his way against Navy (3/15) … Posted three saves, allowing just one goal, at #17 Yale (3/11) … Made one save at Bucknell (3/8) … Saw almost three minutes of action in the home opening win over Marquette (2/8).

AS A FRESHMAN (2013): Played in three games as a freshman, starting once … Made five saves while allowing 12 goals in 37:30 … Made first career start at Air Force (2/24), making four saves through most of the first half … Saw action at #11 Denver (2/23) … Made collegiate debut late in the season opener against Saint Joseph’s (2/10), stopping the only shot sent his way.

BEFORE LEHIGH: Impressed at Strath Haven High School, as a three-year starter and school record holder for career saves … Wrapped up his career in 2012 by earning First Team All-League, All-State, All-Delaware County and All-Philadelphia Inquirer … One of three incoming Lehigh freshmen to earn a spot on the All-Phillylacrosse.com team … Impressed in 2011 as a First Team All-League and All-State performer while garnering First Team U.S. Lacrosse All-America laurels, First Team All-Phillylacrosse.com and Second Team All-Delaware County … A year prior, was named Second Team All-Central League and honorable mention All-Delaware County … Ranked as the #13 incoming goalie by Inside Lacrosse, and 13th by ESPNHS … Two-time Strath Haven defensive MVP … Honors student throughout high school.

PERSONAL: Son of Patrick and Lisa. Brother of Patrick Jr.

CAREER STATISTICS

GETTING TO KNOW STEVE

Nickname: Brody

What’s your favorite thing about Lehigh? The Wildboys

Major & Why: Economics

Favorite Food: Pizza

Favorite Color: Blue

Favorite Musical Artist: Fat Trel

Favorite Movie: Wedding Crashers

Favorite TV Show: Breaking Bad

Favorite Website: Barstool

Favorite Sports Broadcaster: Merrill Reese

Favorite Pro Team: 76ers

Favorite Athlete In Another Sport: Billy LaRosa, Football

Hobbies: Making snapchats, making people smile and occasionally browsing the web

Magazine Cover I'd Like To Be On: ESPN The Magazine

Place I'd Like To Visit: Autobahn Germany

Talent I’d Most Like To Have: Mind control my parents and coaches

Dream Job: Sports Agent

If I Didn't Play Lacrosse, I Would Play: Basketball

If I Had $1 Billion, I Would: Buy a house with a basketball court in it.
